data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Azteca have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Cruz Azul.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 2, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Jesus Duenas is back on the pitch.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jesus Duenas for Tigres who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Tigres surge into the attack at Estadio Azteca but Andre Pierre Gignac’s header is off-target.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 12, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
In the minute 14, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Tigres's half.
Tigres's Julian Quinones gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
In the minute 19, Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Cruz Azul.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 21, Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Julian Quinones (Tigres) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Elias Hernandez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cruz Azul.
Throw-in high up the field for Tigres in Mexico City.
In the minute 27, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a throw-in for Tigres, close to Cruz Azul's area.
Julian Quinones (Tigres) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 29, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Can Tigres capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 31, Jesus Duenas hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Tigres!
Tigres are coming forward and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 33, Tigres to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Throw-in Tigres.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Cruz Azul needs to be cautious. Tigres have an attacking throw-in.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Tigres.
In the minute 39, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Elias Hernandez of Cruz Azul gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 40, Tigres are pushing forward but Javier Aquino's finish is wide of the goal.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
In the minute 44, Jonathan Rodriguez of Cruz Azul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Cruz Azul's Roberto Alvarado misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 45, Tigres are pushing forward but Jesus Duenas's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Mexico City.
In the minute 46, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava has blown to start the second-half.
Nicolas Lopez is replacing Jesus Duenas for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Tigres.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 49, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
In Mexico City Tigres drive forward through Javier Aquino. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 51, Tigres to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 53, Tigres's Luis Quinones gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) gets in a header – but the strike hits the post! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 53, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tigres close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Cruz Azul.
Tigres's Julian Quinones breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 57, Robert Siboldi is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Azteca with Yoshimar Yotun replacing Roberto Alvarado.
Cruz Azul make their second substitution with Jose Martinez replacing Elias Hernandez.
Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 61, Tigres drives forward and Nicolas Lopez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Raymundo Fulgencio is replacing Rafael Carioca for the away team.
In the minute 62, Andre Pierre Gignac's header is off-target for Tigres.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Cruz Azul's Jonathan Rodriguez has run offside.
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Tigres's Julian Quinones attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Jonathan Rodriguez (Cruz Azul) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Juan Sanchez is on a sub for Julian Quinones for Tigres.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 68, Cruz Azul attack but Pablo Aguilar's header doesn't find the target.
Tigres have a goal kick.
Tigres have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 69, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 71, Carlos Salcedo of Tigres gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Tigres.
Adrian Aldrete for Cruz Azul gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
The home team have replaced Jonathan Rodriguez with Santiago Gimenez. This is the third substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
Cruz Azul will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tigres.
In the minute 80, In Mexico City, Andre Pierre Gignac of Tigres is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Tigres throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Tigres a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Goal! Luis Quinones gives Tigres a 0-1 lead in Mexico City.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Tigres are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 86, Jose de Jesus Corona (Cruz Azul) has received a first yellow card.
Cruz Azul's Luis Romo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul attack through Santiago Gimenez. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 89, Tigres to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
At Estadio Azteca the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Azteca.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Tigres.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Azteca.
In Mexico City Cruz Azul attack through Santiago Gimenez. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac has been booked in Mexico City.
Yoshimar Yotun (Cruz Azul) gets a yellow card.
